name: IEEE 1451 developement library
short_description: Multiplatform library was created in order to be able to debug Transducer Electronic Data Sheet memory on a PC and on different microcontrollers. The library can load TEDS memory from xml file on PC, and can  export loaded memory in a header file for embedded systems program.  The library  also allows generation of command and response packet and controls communication between Transducer Interface Module and Network Capable Application Processor modules.
